name: Shabba Ranks
description: '''Rexton Rawlston Fernando Gordon''' [[Order of Distinction|OD]]{{cn|date=December 2023}} (born 17 January 1966), better known by his stage name '''Shabba Ranks''', is a [[Jamaica|Jamaican]] [[dancehall]] musician. In the late 1980s and early 1990s, he was one of the most popular Jamaican musicians in the world. Throughout his prominence in his home country as a dancehall artist, he gained popularity in [[North America]] with his studio album ''[[Just Reality]]'' in 1990. He released other studio albums, including ''[[As Raw as Ever]]'' and ''[[X-tra Naked]]'', which both won a [[Grammy Award]] as [[Grammy Award for Best Reggae Album|Best Reggae Album]] in 1992 and 1993, respectively. He is notoriously popular for "[[Mr. Loverman]]" and "Ting-A-Ling", which were globally acclaimed and deemed his signature songs.
